caption.p: Change in yield depending on farmer adaptation to climate change. ( A– D) Current yield in irrigated and rainfed conditions. ( B, C, E, and F) Change in yield between the 1975–2010 period and 2050 (RCP4.5), either without adaptation ( B and E) or with adaptation of sowing date and duration of growth cycle ( C and F) under irrigated ( B and C) or rainfed conditions ( E and F). Each point, one site, mean value for six GCMs and 30 y, calculated under the hypothesis of an increase in transpiration efficiency with CO 2 concentration.
